author: Siobhán O'Grady, Sudarsan Raghavan, Isabelle Khurshudyan, Kostiantyn Khudov
title: An ‘IT army’ is fighting Russian propaganda
description: How cybersecurity experts work to counter Russian propaganda.
content: The attacks he and others are helping to carry out on Russian websites are part of a wide information war in the background of the much larger conflict here, as Ukrainians target Russian websites to … [+7254 chars]
